column2: but with fish. It's all about fusion dishes
column3: where each dish has a particular combination of 2-4 ingredients. Most combinations
column6: and the brussel sprouts with thai chili
column8: like the hamachi with orange slices
column9: were mediocre. They bring you one dish at a time
column10: and there is a short speech associated with each dish about why they think it's awesome.
